messages.title: Making Scotland Better
messages.content: In government the SNP has delivered real progress...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Keep the Council Tax frozen, easing the pressure on family budgets.
Protect investment in the NHS, ensuring waiting times are shorter and cancer treatment improves.
Maintain the 1,000 extra police on our streets, helping us reduce crime levels further.
Help 100,000 young Scots get training for work, including a record 25,000 modern apprenticeships.
Deliver a 130,000 jobs in the low carbon economy by 2020.
Keep university education free with no tuition fees or graduate contribution.
Continue to deliver balanced budgets for Scotland with savings reinvested to front-line public services.

quotes.text: Together, we can make Scotland better.

images.caption: Campaign message and key policies from the SNP

leaflet.additionalNotes: Instructions on how to vote in the Scotland's election are provided on the leaflet.
